name: Face Recognition Attendance System
description: Develop a real-time face recognition attendance system using Python, MySQL, Tkinter, and Deep Learning. The system marks student presence, integrates with MySQL for attendance records, and utilizes Tkinter for a user-friendly interface.

name: Tableau Dashboard for Entertainment Dataset Analysis
description: Create a Tableau dashboard analyzing datasets from Spotify, Prime Video, Hotstar, and FIFA. Extract insights on user behavior and content consumption trends.

name: Chicken Disease Classification Pipeline
description: Implement a pipeline for chicken disease classification using Git, Python, CNN, and VGG16. Leverage deep learning for accurate identification of Coccidiosis.

name: Automatic Number Plate Recognition (ANPR)
description: Develop an ANPR system using Python, Deep Learning, CNN, and LabelImg. The system automatically tracks and captures vehicle number plates for security and traffic management.

name: Movie Recommender System
description: Build a movie recommendation model using Python, Machine Learning, and cosine similarity. The system suggests movies based on a user's watched history for a personalized experience.
